description: Make a HTTP GET request to a FlowDirector endpoint.

properties.name: url
properties.label: URL
properties.description: Provide the URL to send the HTTP GET request.

properties.name: header_keys
properties.label: Header Keys
properties.description: Specify custom headers. You must provide the corresponding Header Value in the same order.

properties.name: header_values
properties.label: Header Values
properties.description: Specify custom headers. Make sure the corresponding Header Key is defined in the same order.
